meta.title: Ashley Sawdaye | Managing Partner, Galaxy Consulting
meta.description: Explore how Ashley Sawdaye tokenizes real estate and scales freedom-tech ecosystems from Scottsdale, blending MIT engineering with INSEAD strategy.

hero.name: Ashley Sawdaye
hero.title: Managing Partner, Galaxy Consulting | AI & PropTech Strategist
hero.tagline: Painting Arizona’s freedom-tech canvas with compliant real estate tokenization.

about.summary: Ashley Sawdaye is an innovation and operations leader who moved from Washington State to Arizona to tokenize real estate, advise AI ventures, and ignite the state’s freedom-tech ecosystem.

origin_story.headline: From global brands to blockchain frontiers.
origin_story.copy: Ashley launched L’Oréal’s first enterprise digital transformation, helped scale Advertising.com to a $435M acquisition, then founded Galaxy Consulting to guide emerging tech founders.

inflection_point.headline: Tokenizing the built world.
inflection_point.copy: After executing fractional-residential strategies at Lofty AI and architecting a REIT-compliant platform for Growth Holdings, Ashley now applies those lessons to Arizona’s booming real estate market.

mission.headline: Transform Arizona into the premier destination for regulated freedom technologies.

pillars.title: Supportive Ecosystem
pillars.description: Leverage collaborative peers, Arizona Tech Council relationships, and pro-business policy to accelerate founders.

pillars.title: Compliant Innovation
pillars.description: Build tokenization stacks that integrate legal frameworks, transfer agents, and investor protections from day one.

pillars.title: Global Capital Access
pillars.description: Open fractional ownership channels for international investors while lowering CAC and expanding reach.

project.name: Galaxy Consulting
project.problem: Developers and asset managers struggle to unify legal, technical, and investor workflows when tokenizing real estate or launching freedom-tech ventures.
project.solution: Galaxy Consulting orchestrates end-to-end tokenization programs—bridging Web2 UX with Web3 security—while advising founders on AI product ops, compliance, and capital strategy.
value_proposition: Architect REIT-compliant tokenization platforms that integrate KYC/AML, transfer-agency, and marketing funnels.
Reduce customer acquisition cost by 30% through data-driven onboarding flows and global broker partnerships.
Unlock fractional ownership and secondary liquidity for commercial and resort developments across Arizona and beyond.

experience.headline: What working with Ashley feels like.
copy: Co-create tokenization playbooks tailored to the regulatory landscape of each jurisdiction.
Map GTM campaigns for real estate, proptech, medtech, and data center ventures seeking compliant scale.
Plug into Arizona’s freedom-tech community—BitAngels, Stand With Crypto, Arizona Tech Council—to recruit talent and capital.

features: Investor onboarding funnels with automated KYC/AML
Token issuance, custody, and secondary trading workflows
Board-level advisory across emerging tech portfolios

traction.platforms_built: Led tokenization for a commercial developer in Las Vegas and fractional-residential portfolios exceeding $30M at Lofty AI.
traction.ecosystem_role: Active collaborator within Arizona’s freedom-tech community, guiding builders migrating to the state’s supportive canvas.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to tokenize your next development?

highlights: Advises proptech, medtech, and data center ventures on AI, operations, and capital strategy.
Architected a Web2-friendly, Web3-secure tokenization platform at Growth Holdings, cutting CAC by 30%.
EVP at Lofty AI, scaling a $30M fractional-real-estate portfolio with automated underwriting and partnerships.
Led liquid-cooling data center strategy at Mx3 and sourced climate-tech deals as Venture Partner at Kori Capital.
MIT-trained, INSEAD MBA leader committed to conscious business practices and board-level advisory.

quotes.speaker: Ashley
quotes.text: I moved here for family, but I’m staying for business—the ecosystem feels like a canvas we get to paint together.

quotes.speaker: Ashley
quotes.text: Arizona offers support from peers and government. We have the tools to build beautiful things, and we haven’t even hit our stride.

quotes.speaker: Ashley
quotes.text: I’ve tokenized residential and commercial real estate—from Scottsdale to Las Vegas—and I’m bringing those lessons home.

quotes.speaker: Ashley
quotes.text: Every country has its own rules. In the U.S. we may be more regulated, but that’s changing—and compliant innovation wins.

timeline.event: Scaled Advertising.com’s revenue to $20M+ before AOL acquisition and led L’Oréal’s $25M global digital transformation.
Founded Galaxy Consulting to guide emerging tech ventures with conscious business practices.
Served as EVP Strategy & Operations at Lofty AI, automating fractional-investment underwriting.
Joined Growth Holdings as Managing Director to build a REIT-compliant real estate tokenization platform.
Championing Arizona’s freedom-tech renaissance—tokenizing assets, advising founders, and expanding global capital access.
